General.Name: ZongTai Real Estate Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Fu Hua Innovation Co., Ltd. engages in the development of real estate properties in Taiwan. It also leases residential and commercial buildings. The company was formerly known as ZongTai Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fu Hua Innovation Co., Ltd. in July 2023. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

0.Name: Ms. Shun-Wen  Wu
0.Title: Acting GM, Project Mang. & Vice Chairman
